name: Hyper Looter Shooter
description:
Your guns were stolen. Take them back with extreme prejudice.

But be careful, holding too many weapons at once doesn't do your ability to shoot them fast any favors. Thankfully, each enemy is vulnerable to a certain type. Not-so-thankfully, reinforcements come in faster the more you collect.

Credits:

Graphics: goog

Music: Lexacord

Sounds:

http://freetousesounds.com/
https://www.partnersinrhyme.com
https://freesound.org/

The Rest: me, AKA Drury (I was just resting watching others work)

Controls: WASD, 1,2,3 keys and Mouse
